level.heading: Rulemaking.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2 may issue rules and regulations to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 12-112
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-112, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-751.
